Name: maximize_team_utilization
Description: Maximize the average availability of all team members

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of the project in days

Name: maximize_feature_delivery
Description: Maximize the number of high-priority features delivered

Name: minimize_blocker_impact
Description: Minimize the average severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieved sprint goals

Name: minimize_task_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the variance between estimated and actual effort for tasks

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average influence level of satisfied stakeholders

Name: minimize_budget_deviation
Description: Minimize the deviation from the initial project budget

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the team over the last 5 sprints

Name: minimize_sprint_overhead
Description: Minimize the total time spent in meetings per sprint
